long_description: The REI Briefs are comfortable enough to layer beneath your everyday clothing, and they double as high-performance active wear. Soft fabric blend of nylon and spandex breathes well, moves moisture away from skin and dries quickly. Excellent dry time makes the REI Briefs great for travel. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Brushed waistband with high elasticity ensures a comfortable fit outing after outing. Flatseam construction is soft and non-chafing next to skin. Functional fly.
short_description: The REI Briefs are comfortable enough to layer beneath your everyday clothing, and they double as high-performance active wear.
